DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Measuring level calgranulin A calgranulin B blood patient breast cancer laboratory may help doctor identify learn biomarkers relate breast cancer . PURPOSE : This laboratory study measure calgranulin A calgranulin B level blood patient newly diagnose stage I , stage II , stage III breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Calgranulin A/B Levels Patients With Newly Diagnosed Stage I , II , III Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine circulating level calgranulin A calgranulin B patient estrogen receptor negative estrogen receptor positive , newly diagnose , primary stage I-III adenocarcinoma breast . OUTLINE : This pilot study . Patients undergo blood draw follow diagnosis breast cancer ass level circulate tumor marker , calgranulin A calgranulin B. Serum sample evaluate enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay tumor marker expression . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 60 patient accrue study .
